Jim Unwin

Hello, I'm an illustrator, designer and inveterate maker of things.

I do graphic design for screen and print but especially for games (with an emphasis on functionality and usability). I also do illustration, talking to people and getting things done.

Recently I've been working on the game LittleBigPlanet2 with Media Molecule. You can find out what I did by clicking here. Making games is a lot of fun!
